translations: n.（16、17世纪时流行的）轻快活泼的双人舞

sentences.sentence: Nay, if there be any, that would reign, and take up all the time, let him find means to take them off, and to bring others on; as musicians use to do, with those that dance too long galliards.
sentences.translation: 不但如此，如果有人要霸占一切说话底时间，就应当设法把这种人移开而使别的人开言，就好象乐师们看见有人跳“欢乐舞”跳得过久的时候的所为一样。
